Title: Don 2
Writer: Farhan Akhtar (dialogue), Farhan Akhtar (story), Javed Akhtar (characters), Salim Khan (characters), Ameet Mehta (screenplay), Ameet Mehta (story), Rajshri Sudhakar (Dialogue Writer: Telugu)
Actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Priyanka Chopra, Boman Irani, Lara Dutta
Plot: An international gangster turns himself in, then dramatically escapes - only to face treachery and betrayal.
